text: was a Japanese politician. He was a member of the Diet of Japan between 1995 to 2007. He was Senior Vice-Minister for Foreign Affairs under the government of Junichiro Koizumi from 2001 to 2006.Profile at Ministry of Foreign Affairs Abe died on October 25, 2020 in Tokyo at the age of 77.元参院議員の阿部正俊氏死去 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Japanese politicians Category:Yamagata Prefecture
title: Masatoshi Abe
